    • Method Detail

      • getTesterIndicatorsParameters

        java.util.Map<Instrument,ITesterIndicatorsParameters> getTesterIndicatorsParameters()
        Returns:
        map of tester indicator parameters and their corresponding instruments.

        Returned map will be used to determine if tester indicators should be enabled on a chart that corresponds to a given instrument.
        The map must contain instruments and the corresponding indicator parameter.
        The Instruments contained in this map should correspond to instruments passed in IClient.setSubscribedInstruments(java.util.Set)
